data.name: SUPER PEOPLE
data.detailed_description:
DISCORD


We invite you to the mysterious 'Orb Island'.

There are lot of hidden environments and secrets on Orb Island.

Throughout the island where all the action takes place, there are beautiful villages, research facilities, and diverse ecological environments.
Among them are mysterious locations and special landmarks that hold many secrets.
As you explore the island, you must familiarize yourself with all the tactical choke points, advantageous grounds for combat, and how to acquire good gear.

Orb Island is surrounded by fierce snow storms that will close in on the map as the match progresses.
Move quickly to secure useful items and find safety from the snowstorm.
It is also helpful to be on the lookout for any developments in your vicinity and to react quickly to it.


About the Game

Battle Royale on another level. Enjoy faster and more intense battles with SUPER PEOPLE.

This game is a new form of a Battle Royale Shooter.

🔥 The Ultimate Battle Royale Experience Only the Survivor Takes It All!
SUPER PEOPLE is a next-level battle royale FPS powered by Unreal Engine, delivering high-end visuals and intense action.

Choose from 15 unique super soldiers, each with 9 special abilities and a powerful ultimate skill. Join solo, duo, or squad battles and fight to be the last one standing.

Every match offers a changing battlefield and growth path, ensuring fresh and strategic gameplay each time. With ultimates that can turn the tide of battle, you’ll experience thrilling combat impact and deep immersion. Switch freely between FPP (first-person) and TPP (third-person) modes to dominate the battlefield with your own combat style.

⚔️ Growth and Crafting – Never a Dull Moment in Looting!
Your character grows simply by surviving, thanks to an organic progression system.

Through looting, defeating players, and more, your soldier grows stronger as class-specific skills and ultimates unlock step by step, ramping up the tempo of combat.

During battle, gather materials from the field to craft and upgrade weapons and equipment on the fly.

This naturally drives exploration of diverse areas, while also adding the thrill of strategic movement—knowing that combat can erupt anywhere, anytime.

The ever-evolving character growth, enhanced gear, and the accelerating pace guarantee an engaging, high-intensity experience right to the very end.

👾 Immersion Through Detail – Combat, Visuals, and the Freedom of Choice
In the heat of battle, choose from a wide variety of weapons: AR, SMR, SR, DMR, shotguns, pistols, throwables, and melee weapons—craft your own tactics with your preferred loadout. Supply drops arriving at set intervals spark fierce clashes, creating another highlight moment on the battlefield.

To top it off, eye-catching character designs and stylish outfits let you stand out while fighting for survival.

SUPER PEOPLE is more than just another FPS. It’s a hybrid battle royale that combines stunning visuals, rewarding growth, and the thrill of victory all in one.

data.short_description: SUPER PEOPLE is a skill-driven battle royale from WONDER PEOPLE. With 15 super soldiers, each with unique abilities, you shape the pace of engagements, your tactics, and the finish—turning a familiar battle royale into a completely different kind of fun.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

data.legal_notice: ⓒ Wonder People Co.,Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, including:

Frequent and intense violence involving realistic gunfights, explosions, and graphic blood effects.

Scenes of combat-related gore, such as blood splatter upon impact or injury.

Dark, war-themed atmosphere that may be disturbing to some players.

While the game does not include sexual content, non-consensual acts, or depictions of substance abuse or self-harm, the realistic depiction of combat and injury may be considered inappropriate for younger audiences.

Player discretion is advised.
